41d17c1a-7550-4597-abdb-43b7a523bd51.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how RapidSOS works, including the high-level architecture related to RapidSOS Additional Data Repository and Application Programming Interfaces. The earner has an actionable understanding of what data is available inside RapidSOS and how it is presented, utilized, and managed. The earner has successfully completed a knowledge assessment developed to document their comprehension of RapidSOS Basics.
41d17c1a-7550-4597-abdb-43b7a523bd51.name: RapidSOS Ready Basics

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Basics course is designed to provide new users with a brief introduction to RapidSOS - what it is and how it can enhance emergency response in ECCs across the country. Because RapidSOS is designed to be used on every incoming 911 and Alert call, a foundational understanding of what data is presented and how it can be applied to incoming emergencies is a key outcome.

8b8c88bc-e7a8-4aa7-864a-be54f7e59dc9.description: Earners of this badge are responsible for training and supervising RapidSOS users at their respective agencies. Liability exposure, training analytics, and account maintenance are discussed with opportunities for the earner to submit sample policies for review. Scenarios and use-case examples are presented throughout the course to broaden the earner's understanding of how supplemental location information and digital data can be utilized on incoming emergency events.
8b8c88bc-e7a8-4aa7-864a-be54f7e59dc9.name: RapidSOS Ready Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Advanced course is designed for employees who are responsible for managing their RapidSOS accounts. This course discusses liability protection through solid policy as well as training analytics and account maintenance. Scenarios are presented throughout the course to broaden the earner's understanding of how supplemental location information and digital data can be utilized on incoming emergency events.

5017646c-490f-48f8-8340-6859d513496c.description: Earners of this badge are Premium Analytics users who identify, communicate and implement data-driven insights to make more informed decisions. Earners efficiently analyze and utilize Premium data to draw conclusions to describe, predict and improve their ECC performance. Earners interact with a variety of reporting options, including utilization, training, and other visualizations in support of decision-making efforts.
5017646c-490f-48f8-8340-6859d513496c.name: RapidSOS Ready Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Analytics course outlines a number of reporting options available to RapidSOS Premium users. It is designed for management-level employees whose responsibilities include analyzing data using statistical techniques to create reports that supplement policy creation, staffing requirements, and other ECC operational recommendations.

fa49aeb2-9895-4d4c-8c6c-605862c7b3cc.description: Earners of this badge have established their foundational knowledge regarding RapidSOS and its functions. Earners efficiently analyze and apply presented in RapidSOS to incoming emergency and non-emergency requests. Earners interact with a variety of map views and tools to enhance workflows and outcomes. The earner has successfully completed a scenario-based knowledge assessment that formally documents their comprehension of RapidSOS Basics.
fa49aeb2-9895-4d4c-8c6c-605862c7b3cc.name: RapidSOS Ready Intermediate

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Intermediate course is designed to help users build upon the knowledge gained during the RapidSOS Basics course and should be standard training for all call-takers and dispatchers who actively work the floor. This course will provide additional insight into the different data sources available inside RapidSOS Portal, as well as additional dashboard features, how to access support, how to provide RapidSOS your feedback and how to keep your RapidSOS account secure.

35e11dc5-ece7-4ba8-84ef-7d9d2261f2a2.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated a proactive approach to foundational RapidSOS education as it pertains to the components of the RapidSOS Intelligent Safety Platform.
35e11dc5-ece7-4ba8-84ef-7d9d2261f2a2.name: RapidSOS Ready Premium (Reseller)

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Partner Portal houses a number of courses, and on-demand materials designed to provide a high-level overview of RapidSOS Premium features to our reseller partners. This course encourages our resellers to deepen their understanding of the dynamic evolution of RapidSOS Premium and those of our partners as they continue to develop a solid knowledge base to provide in-depth insight to ECCs across the country.

ab78aca2-e7a1-4bdc-808e-7e1fa2af7482.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated a proactive approach to continuous education as it pertains to RapidSOS, emerging technology and the 911 profession.
ab78aca2-e7a1-4bdc-808e-7e1fa2af7482.name: RapidSOS Ready Scholar

badge_template_activities.title: The RapidSOS Academy houses a variety of links and knowledge-based articles designed to provide a high-level overview of public safety and emerging technologies. This course is not a requirement but is presented to encourage users to deepen their understanding of the dynamic evolution of the 911 landscape as they continue to develop at their respective ECCs.
